title: How to save 4 Figures this Year: Life Changing Techniques that will save you Money
description: This book is about how to save at least $1000 this year. The material in this book will make you aware of saving opportunities that exist right under our noses. My intention is to help anyone who is struggling to get to the next phase in their life. You could be the entrepreneur wanting to save for his or her first business goal. Or maybe you want to save for a big vacation next year. Or just someone who wants to stop living from paycheck to paycheck. This book is for you!
author: Kenneth Bellard
